experiences.title: Intern
bullets: Shadowed the Data & AI team, gaining hands-on experience with data pipelines, ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes, and building data flows that support AI models.
Developed a solid understanding of enterprise data architecture and how structured data enables AI-driven decision-making.
Gained exposure to training and evaluating machine learning models, including understanding how algorithms improve predictive accuracy.

experiences.title: Laboratory & Technical Support Assistant (Part-Time)
bullets: Monitored laboratory equipment to detect malfunctions and identify defective parts, ensuring smooth operation.
Supported the organization and execution of college events, including hackathons, competitions, and student activities.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Data Science

certifications.title: Data Science & Artificial Intelligence Bootcamp
bullets: Performed full data exploration and manipulation using Python, applying EDA techniques to extract meaningful insights.
Applied core statistical methods, probability concepts, and matrix operations to strengthen analytical accuracy and model foundations.
Developed and optimized predictive machine learning models (regression & classification), ensuring strong performance and reliable decision-making.
Built and refined deep learning neural networks using Keras/TensorFlow, improving model accuracy and generalization.
Processed and structured language data using advanced NLP techniques, including text preprocessing, tokenization, and word embeddings.

projects.title: Graduation Project - Smart Health Predictor
bullets: Developed a Flask-based web application integrating machine learning models (Random Forest, Logistic Regression, Decision Tree) to predict diabetes, heart disease, and breast cancer risk with up to 95% accuracy.
Applied data preprocessing techniques (KNN imputation, one-hot encoding, outlier handling) and implemented automated retraining, enabling a scalable, user-friendly health prediction dashboard.

projects.title: Graduation Project | Bidaya - AI Interview Platform
bullets: Built a Full-Stack AI-powered interview simulation platform leveraging LLMs (GPT-4o), Flask-based REST APIs, and a modern React/Vite frontend.
Integrated AI-driven job-role adaptation with speech-to-text and text-to-speech (Whisper, TTS), supporting Arabic and English interactions.

other_sections: Member | Student Club | College of Computer Science and Engineering
